description:
Toki and Ken are finally reunited. Toki smashes through the attacking Royal Guard with the North Star Humane Face Breaker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cassandra Houkai! Hokuto no Shinwa wa Nurikaerareta!!
The Fall of Cassandra! The Myth of the North Star Is Rewritten!
カサンドラ崩壊! 北斗の神話はぬりかえられた!!
